text: Kylie Jenner caused engagement speculation once again when she stepped out in Paris on July 22 to support Travis Scott ’ s show while wearing a diamond ring on her left ring finger. Are they getting hitched soon? Kylie Jenner, 20, and Travis Scott, 26, once again sparked engagement rumors when Kylie showed up in Paris on July 22 to support her beau while wearing a diamond ring on her left ring finger. The Keeping Up with the Kardashians star was seen in a blue camo tank top and flashed her bling as she left her hotel to go and catch Travis ’ performance at the Lollapalooza music festival.
